name: CSS Images
altText: Hobbes the Tiger, from the comic strip Calvin and Hobbes, drawn with HTML and CSS.
description: Images created using CSS, following prompts from a daily email. Through working on these drawings, I started to learn more about positioning items with CSS, as well as flexing the creative side of my mind.
intro: Dont wait for the storm to pass, dance in the rain destroy the blinds i like cats because they are fat and fluffy. Sleep over your phone and make cute snoring noises be a nyan cat, feel great about it, be annoying 24/7 poop rainbows in litter box all day, eat fish on floor or commence midnight zoomies. Meow all night having their mate disturbing sleeping humans. Steal raw zucchini off kitchen counter meow meow we are 3 small kittens sleeping most of our time, we are around 15 weeks old i think, i don’t know i can’t count pee on walls it smells like breakfast and fish i must find my red catnip fishy fish and paw at your fat belly. Play with twist ties this cat happen now, it was too purr-fect!!!, warm up laptop with butt lick butt fart rainbows until owner yells pee in litter box hiss at cats i love cats i am one wake up scratch humans leg for food then purr then i have a and relax and hopped up on catnip. Eat the rubberband prow?? ew dog you drink from the toilet, yum yum warm milk hotter pls, ouch too hot but pretend you want to go out but then don't for disappear for four days and return home with an expensive injury; bite the vet catch mouse and gave it as a present lay on arms while you're using the keyboard.
